sentences.sContent: Some petrochemical projects, which provide raw materials to make plastics and fertilizers, also are under pressure.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some petrochemical projects, which provide raw materials to make plastics and fertilizers, also are under pressure.
sentences.sCn: 一些为制造塑料和化肥提供原材料的石化项目也面临着资金压力。

sentences.sContent: " since a forest of petrochemical facilities and industrial sprawl lines the freeways and railways in the northern part of the state near New York.
sentences.sContent_eng: " since a forest of petrochemical facilities and industrial sprawl lines the freeways and railways in the northern part of the state near New York.
sentences.sCn: 因为在新泽西州靠近纽约的北部地区，高速路和铁路两侧遍布着由石化厂和工业区构成的“森林”。

sentences.sContent: It is strong in chemical and petrochemical, automobile and engineering, agro and food processing, textiles and jewelry.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is strong in chemical and petrochemical, automobile and engineering, agro and food processing, textiles and jewelry.
sentences.sCn: 在化工、石化、汽车、工程、农业和食品加工、纺织品和珠宝方面具有优势。

trans.tranOther: any chemical substance obtained from  petroleum  or natural gas
